tweets.text: It's nearly 9pm and I've accidently left a window open upstairs...just ran up to close it before the @RedIndustries2 gas hits us. @EnvAgency do you plan your life around being gassed by H2S? Asking for a friend... #stopthestink #landfill https://t.co/1ZkqqDuDCW

Could @EnvAgencyMids explain why spot monitoring was done for the Chorley landfill but not for Walleys Quarry.  The pollution at Walleys is much higher, as are the complaints.  

#StopTheStink https://t.co/WSuESgJrxF

@StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA We called at our friends house last night ( cotswold ave) Jesus!!!!!! The smell was hoffic. How ANYONE living closer to that cesspit copes I don't know.? 
Now we are home Clayton,  and its nearly as bad. We have complained numerous times. Needs to stop.@stopthestink @EnvAgency

Me driving an hour away from Newcastle under Lyme today to get some fresh air. 
If the @EnvAgency don‚Äôt grow a pair next month we‚Äôll prob have to drive 2 hours! #stopthestink @StinkStopthe #capitoff https://t.co/i3dTWzRv7i

Something to get passionate about @WaterUK @DefraWater @OfwatChiefExec @EnvAgency have made it this way and can stop it right now - no new law required, just stop bending it. @RachSalv @AnglingTrust @WildlifeTrusts https://t.co/GXWd0xbOKc

@EnvAgency data shows #whalleysquarry air monitoring so far has breached @WHO limit for health and is far higher than any other landfill monitored. Landfill is still taking waste. No action from @PHE_uk. When will this health hazard stop? #stopthestink https://t.co/rvQEg7tGh8

#StopTheStink this needs closing down ASAP so many pregnancies and young babies are been affected by this, it‚Äôs unthinkable what could happen @RedIndustries2 @StinkStopthe @MattHancock @PHE_uk @EnvAgency @BorisJohnson @JamesBevanEA https://t.co/UilAnBVZIx

You‚Äôll be living and breathing crap from Walley‚Äôs Quarry Landfill owned by Red industries and this is your view @EnvAgency https://t.co/qPTut31f8I

I left my home yesterday due to the stink from Walley‚Äôs Quarry owned by Red Industries and supposedly regulated by the inept @EnvAgency. When I turned onto my road tonight I was gagging in my car and my one year old woke up screaming. Shame on you. #StopTheStink @StinkStopthe

tweets.text: 5pm: wafts of landfill. 6.30pm: landfill smell, so we decide to go on a long walk. 8pm: driving down the road and I can feel my throat burning, get out the car and it REEKS, my nostrils are burning too. Quickly get us and cats inside. #StoptheStink

You know the landfill fumes are a problem when a gent 5 miles away says they‚Äôre horrific. Only a matter of time before the health effects spread further @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland Your strategy to play this down & gas light our town isn‚Äôt working #stopthestink https://t.co/WOuBPHkCDo

tweets.text: Once again the residents of Newcastle under Lyme ETC  are suffering from the stench emanating from walleys quarry owned by @RedIndustries2  people are being gassed in their own beds, EVERYONE, especially the young, the elderly as well as the medically vulnerable #stopthestink

@annjsmall @StinkStopthe @PersimmonHomes Our view. We were told it would never go above the tree line. This is the view I look UP to from our bedroom window on the first floor @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @AaronBell4NUL https://t.co/5J2yQ8APSR

A question was asked of me from the #StopTheStink  community how the off-site hydrogen sulphide levels compared to other landfill sites recently monitored by the EA. Here are the results from my FOI request. Walley‚Äôs Quarry Landfill is on the bottom row. https://t.co/qRXBVkXVc8

It‚Äôs sad though isn‚Äôt it, I‚Äôve started to hate my own home & the garden that I love & my overwhelming feeling is to flee-  guess that‚Äôs what happens when you‚Äôre under attack @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/KOdpPhfcWu
